original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 326.50/90 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 326.50/90 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 326.70/80 the previous day, dealers said.
On the Colombo Stock Exchange, the ASPI opened up at 10,836, and the S&P SL20 at 3,138.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.80/95 percent from 13.80/95 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 13.85/95 percent from 13.80/13.95 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was steady at 14.05/15 percent. (Colombo/Dec14/2023)
